reviews.author: Lucy C
reviews.review: Well maintained, clean, safe, pet friendly, plenty of parking, and beautiful courtyard. A nice community for independent seniors.

reviews.author: Sherri Ransom
reviews.review: Ive lived at WoodRose apartments for nearly eight years. I enjoy my apartment as well as the community of my neighbors. Many activities are offered to the residents and the maintenance crew is excellent!

reviews.author: Laurie Lusk
reviews.review: I'm a caregiver for a client here. The apartments are nicely laid out. Easy access. But not enough handicapped parking available for residents or visitors.

reviews.author: Lee Gayle
reviews.review: I have been in Woodrose now for 3 years plus and it has been a very comfortable experience. The staff whether it be office or maintenance are wonderful and do a very good job and are professional in their work ethic.

ownerResponse.text: We would like to have a better understanding about your experience. Please reach out to us at your earliest convenience and we will do our best to resolve this with you.  More

reviews.author: Joan Rayborn
reviews.review: Came within 2 hours for  a non-emergency problem. My kitchen  sink was not draining. Ole fixed it immediately, and cleaned up the mess. He was so polite and friendly. It is great to have him as our caretaker. So glad he is back!

reviews.author: Natalia Dunaevscaia
reviews.review: Thank you so much to the staff at Woodrose! They always do a good job! I am so happy here.

reviews.review:
After 65 years I know what it's like to have people care about you.
I absolutely love this place and the people that run it.

reviews.author: American Classic
reviews.review: Tv rooms close during prime time shows 9 pm on, so unless you pay $160-$200 a month in cable/I internet you miss a lot by media rooms closing so early. They could leave the library open all night for night owls and prime time tv. Tho,

ownerResponse.text: Hello, we are happy to see that your experience has been a positive one! The team here at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments is always available for any assistance that you may need. Thank you for taking the time to leave us your rating!

reviews.author: Leon Charbonneau
reviews.review: The workers were quick, clean,. thorough and courteous.

Hello Leon,
We're glad to hear we delivered such a great experience. If there's anything further we can do for you, we are happy to help!  More

reviews.author: Steven Perry
reviews.review: UPDATE: Contacted the main office and they were able to work with my grandma to get her down from the top floor. Very kind and worked with us to quickly remedy the situation. Thank you very much Woodrose Apartments.

ownerResponse.text: Hi Steven,Thank you for the review! We absolutely agree that the top floors can get very warm during the Summer months in our communities without A/C. I can assure you it wasn't much better on the lower levels during this recent heat wave.  More

reviews.author: Susan Haase
reviews.review: The buildings are dingy inside.  No amenities of any kind.  The website is inaccurate--there is no fitness room.  We feel threatened by the homeless that come onto the property to steal and can smell the exhaust from Sunset during the evening commute.  Not a pleasant place to live.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for reaching out regarding your concerns. Please direct any concerns regarding mask mandates to the office. We appreciate you taking the time to review!

reviews.author: Melissa Loomis
reviews.review: New (owners?) made my grandma's last days very stressful and miserable; not what she needed with a heart condition for sure. She loved her friends in the building, some of the sweetest neighbors. She wasn't allowed to enjoy the small things

reviews.author: Hal McFarland
reviews.review: 2 years in and Im still happy with my choice. Fair Field management is very responsive to all maintenance issues, residents are like a very caring family, and its nice to live in a quiet community

reviews.author: Cheryl Giles
reviews.review: The apartments are nice, clean and generally well maintained. The staff are pleasant and professional.  I feel safe.  Enjoy the central location to local community and excellent bus access.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for the wonderful review, Cheryl!

reviews.author: Toni Johnson
reviews.review: Senior living with rent controlled private individual units and plenty of parking. Secured entry that is easy to use. Most people there are friendly and the place is well kept.

reviews.author: Suzanne Magnuson
reviews.review: Not happy with losing Internet & TV. The cost will be so much higher for the same service. And do we get anything in return for removing this service? And the mention of the 'Senior' option, that's only for people on MEDICAID.

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for reviewing our community! Our residents are able to be set up services in their own name so that they can better manage their packages and pricing. Please contact the office if you have any questions or we can better serve your needs!

reviews.author: Richard Morgan
reviews.review: Excellent response to refrigerator failure.  Could not ask for better service.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Richard, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at Woodrose Senior Affordable Apartments. We're happy we could meet your expectations!
The Woodrose Team.

reviews.author: Alice King
reviews.review: Prompt, fast, friendly service.  Repairs always done to satisfaction.  Thank you for such a good maintenance man.

reviews.author: Betty Altieri
reviews.review: This was my first choice due to location and I have been here for 10 years this November.

ownerResponse.text:
